title: Add generateBeads command to create issues from decisions
description: Implement the stubbed generateBeads() function to automatically create Beads issues from Keel decisions
close_reason: Implemented generate-beads command that creates Beads issues from decisions via bd create

title: Create README.md similar to Beads documentation style
description: Create a comprehensive README.md with usage examples, architecture overview, and integration guides similar to the Beads project
close_reason: Created comprehensive README.md with quick start, commands, architecture, SDK usage, and Beads integration

title: Convert Keel from TypeScript to Go binary
description:
## Goal
Make Keel usable in any repo (Swift, Android, etc.) by converting from Bun/TypeScript to a standalone Go binary.

## Why
Currently requires Bun runtime. Go binary = single executable, works everywhere, matches Beads architecture.

## Approach
1. Port core types (Decision, DecisionInput)
2. Port storage (JSONL append, SQLite index)
3. Port commands (decide, why, supersede, context, search, validate, curate, generate-beads)
4. Port ID generation (hash-based)
5. Build/release for multiple platforms

## Reference
- Look at Beads repo structure for Go CLI patterns
- Use cobra for CLI (like Beads)
- Use sqlite3 driver for Go

## Success Criteria
- `keel decide` works in a Swift project
- Same JSONL/SQLite format (compatible with TypeScript version)

title: Add validation command to check file/symbol references
description: Implement the stubbed validate() function to verify that files and symbols referenced in decisions still exist in the codebase
close_reason: Implemented validate command that checks file references. See DEC-14b0.

title: Add curate command for decision summarization
description: Implement the stubbed curate() function following ACE framework to compress old decisions into structured playbooks
close_reason: Implemented curate command with getCurationCandidates, createSummary, markCurated, formatForAgent. See DEC-7543.

title: Create Claude Code plugin for keel skill distribution
description: Package keel skill as a Claude Code plugin so users can install via 'claude plugin add keel' instead of manual symlinks
close_reason: Added .claude-plugin/plugin.json for Claude Code plugin distribution

title: Add Claude skills file for Keel workflow
description:
## Goal
Add a .claude/skills.md or similar that teaches Claude the Keel+Beads workflow, replacing AGENTS.md.

## Why
Beads uses Claude skills for automatic workflow injection. More elegant than AGENTS.md.

## Approach
1. Look at Beads repo for skills file format
2. Create skills file documenting:
   - How to read context (bd show, keel context --bead)
   - How to record decisions (keel decide --beads)
   - How to track work (bd update)
   - The epic = plan, decisions = rationale pattern

## Reference
- https://github.com/steveyegge/beads - check their Claude skills setup

title: Link Keel decisions to Beads issues
close_reason: Added --beads flag to decide command, queryByBead function, and beads display in output. See DEC-36be.
